TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed BitmapCache extends System.Windows.Media.CacheMode
Public NotInheritable Class BitmapCache Inherits CacheMode
public ref class BitmapCache sealed : System::Windows::Media::CacheMode

summary.span: 创建并缓存 的位图表示形式。

span.span: Creates and caches a bitmap representation of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用类改进的一种复杂的呈现性能。Use the class to improve rendering performance of a complex . 创建和将其分配给属性作为视频内存中的位图缓存和的元素及其子树。Create a and assign it to the property of a to cache the element and its subtree as a bitmap in video memory. 这是有用的当你需要进行动画处理、 转换或缩放以尽可能快。This is useful when you need to animate, translate, or scale a as quickly as possible. 当缓存内容，这种方法将启用性能和视觉质量之间的权衡。This approach enables a tradeoff between performance and visual quality while content is cached. 使用类，以有效地重复使用缓存的元素。Use the class to efficiently reuse a cached element. 设置要缩放位图缓存的属性。Set the property to scale the bitmap cache. 如果元素将被缩放，并且你想要比缓存只需生成元素的本机分辨率更清楚地呈现的元素，这非常有用。This is useful if an element will be zoomed, and you want the element to render more clearly than it would if the cache were simply generated at the element’s native resolution. 设置当缓存显示需要像素的对齐方式来呈现正确，例如 ClearType 文本的内容时，属性。Set the property when the cache displays content that requires pixel-alignment to render correctly, such as ClearType text. 通过将忽略此属性和类。This property is ignored by the and classes. 高速缓存控件不会影响鼠标上的行为，因此鼠标上的点击测试运作就好像它位图是实时的控件。Caching a control does not affect mouse-over behavior, so mouse-over hit testing operates as if it the bitmap were a live control. 缓存重新生成时才会发生时的结构或其子树的更改，或当设置更改。Cache regeneration occurs only when the structure of the or its subtree changes, or when the settings change. 设置或属性导致缓存重新生成。Setting the or properties causes cache regeneration. 更改到父可视化树的已缓存，例如转换、 规模、 不透明度和影响，不会影响缓存。Changes to the parent visual tree of the cached , such as transforms, scales, opacities, and effects, do not affect the cache. 硬件加速不可用时缓存的函数。The cache functions when hardware acceleration is not available. 在这种情况下，在软件中呈现位图和最大位图维度为 2048 x 2048。In this case, the bitmap is rendered in software, and the maximum bitmap dimensions are 2048 x 2048. > [!NOTE] > 和通过缓存的元素将不会传播。 and do not propagate through a cached element. 你可能需要在缓存之下的子元素中再次设置这些选项。You may have to set these options again in child elements below the cache. ## Examples 下面的 XAML 演示如何缓存元素。The following XAML shows how to cache a element. 有关完整的代码示例，请参阅[How to： 提高通过缓存元素的呈现性能](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-improve-rendering-performance-by-caching-an-element.md)。For the complete code example, see [How to: Improve Rendering Performance by Caching an Element](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-improve-rendering-performance-by-caching-an-element.md). [!code-xaml[System.Windows.Media.BitmapCache#_BitmapCacheCreation](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/system.windows.media.bitmapcache/cs/window1.xaml#_bitmapcachecreation)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的 XAML 演示如何创建和分配到元素。The following XAML shows how to create and assign a to a element. 有关完整的代码示例，请参阅[How to： 提高通过缓存元素的呈现性能](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-improve-rendering-performance-by-caching-an-element.md)。For the complete code example, see [How to: Improve Rendering Performance by Caching an Element](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-improve-rendering-performance-by-caching-an-element.md). span.span: When copying the object's dependency properties, this method copies expressions (which might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.

returns.span: 当前对象的可修改复本。

public: property bool EnableClearType { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否在激活 ClearType 的情况下呈现位图。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the bitmap is rendered with ClearType activated.

value.span: 如果 ClearType 处于活动状态，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if ClearType is active; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置属性，以允许要在缓存中呈现的 ClearType 文本。Set the property to allow ClearType text to be rendered in the cache. 当属性是`true`，你的应用程序必须呈现其所有 ClearType 文本不透明背景上。When the property is `true`, your application must render all of its ClearType text on an opaque background. 当属性是`false`，缓存中的文本呈现与灰度抗锯齿功能。When the property is `false`, text in the cache is rendered with grayscale antialiasing. ClearType 文本需要正确的像素对齐方式呈现的字符，因此应设置属性`true`。ClearType text requires correct pixel alignment of rendered characters, so you should set the property to `true`. 如果未设置此属性，可能不会正确混合内容。If you do not set this property, the content may not blend correctly. 使用以便安全地缓存 ClearType 文本，当你知道缓存时，属性呈现在像素边界上。Use the property when you know the cache is rendered on pixel boundaries, so it is safe to cache ClearType text. 在文本滚动的情况下通常出现这种情况。This situation occurs commonly in text-scrolling scenarios.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.DependencyProperty EnableClearTypeProperty
Public Shared ReadOnly EnableClearTypeProperty As DependencyProperty

span.span: Identifies the dependency property.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double RenderAtScale { double get(); void set(double value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示应用于位图的缩放比例。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates the scale that is applied to the bitmap.

value.span: 应用于位图的缩放比例。

span.span: The scale that is applied to the bitmap.
The default is 1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来呈现正常位图大小的倍数。Use the property to render the at a multiple of the normal bitmap size. 正常的大小由元素的本地大小确定。The normal size is determined by the local size of the element. 大于 1 增加的相对于元素，本机解析位图分辨率的值而小于 1 的值降低分辨率。Values greater than 1 increase the resolution of the bitmap relative to the native resolution of the element, and values less than 1 decrease the resolution. 例如，如果属性设置为 2.0 中，而你应用的 2 倍放大内容了缩放变换，内容会有相同的视觉质量使用相同的内容作为设置为 1.0 和转换范围为 1。For example, if the property is set to 2.0, and you apply a scale transform that enlarges the content by a factor of 2, the content will have the same visual quality as the same content with set to 1.0 and a transform scale of 1. 当设置为 0，不呈现任何位图。When is set to 0, no bitmap is rendered. 负值被限制为 0。Negative values are clamped to 0. 如果更改此值，请在相应的新解决方法是重新生成缓存。If you change this value, the cache is regenerated at the appropriate new resolution. 下图显示相同的内容的不同值的显示方式属性。The following images show how the same content appears for different values of the property. **RenderAtScale = 1****RenderAtScale = 1** ![RenderAtScale = 1](~/add/media/ndp-scale-1.png "RenderAtScale = 1")![RenderAtScale = 1](~/add/media/ndp-scale-1.png "RenderAtScale = 1") **RenderAtScale = 0.5****RenderAtScale = 0.5** ![RenderAtScale = 0.5](~/add/media/ndp-scale05.png "RenderAtScale = 0.5")![RenderAtScale = 0.5](~/add/media/ndp-scale05.png "RenderAtScale = 0.5") **RenderAtScale = 0.2****RenderAtScale = 0.2** ![RenderAtScale = 0.2](~/add/media/ndp-scale02.png "RenderAtScale = 0.2")![RenderAtScale = 0.2](~/add/media/ndp-scale02.png "RenderAtScale = 0.2") 下图显示应用于缓存元素的祖先缩放转换。The following image shows a zoom transform that is applied to an ancestor of the cached element. 缩放比例设置为 1 时和设置为 1，图像质量是几乎相同时设置为 2。When the zoom is set to 1 and is set to 1, the image quality is almost the same as when is set to 2. 但当缩放大于 1，设置为 2 将具有更高的图像质量。But when zoom is greater than 1, setting to 2 will have better image quality. **RenderAtScale = 1.0****RenderAtScale = 1.0** ![RenderAtScale = 1.0](~/add/media/ndp-scale-10.png "RenderAtScale = 1.0")![RenderAtScale = 1.0](~/add/media/ndp-scale-10.png "RenderAtScale = 1.0") **RenderAtScale = 2.0****RenderAtScale = 2.0** ![RenderAtScale = 2.0](~/add/media/ndp-scale-20.png "RenderAtScale = 2.0")![RenderAtScale = 2.0](~/add/media/ndp-scale-20.png "RenderAtScale = 2.0")

Public Shared ReadOnly RenderAtScaleProperty As DependencyProperty

span.span: Identifies the dependency property.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool SnapsToDevicePixels { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在呈现位图时是否启用像素对齐功能。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the bitmap is rendered with pixel snapping.

value.span: 如果像素对齐处于活动状态，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if pixel snapping is active; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置当缓存显示需要像素的对齐方式正确呈现的内容时，属性。Set the property when the cache displays content that requires pixel-alignment to render correctly. 这是 ClearType 文本的大小写。This is the case for ClearType text. 如果你设置属性`true`，请考虑设置到`true`以确保正确呈现。If you set the property to `true`, consider setting to `true` to ensure proper rendering. 当属性设置为`false`、 可以移动并缓存的元素的缩放量的像素一小部分和双线性筛选应用。When the property is set to `false`, you can move and scale the cached element by a fraction of a pixel, and bilinear filtering is applied. 当属性设置为`true`，与目标像素边界对齐位图缓存。When the property is set to `true`, the bitmap cache is aligned with pixel boundaries of the destination. 如果移动或通过一个像素的一部分缩放缓存的元素，则会与像素网格对齐位图。If you move or scale the cached element by a fraction of a pixel, the bitmap snaps to the pixel grid. 在这种情况下，向上舍入数据并与位图左上角对齐到像素网格中，但右下角位于的小数部分的像素边界上。In this case, the top-left corner of the bitmap is rounded up and snapped to the pixel grid, but the bottom-right corner is on a fractional pixel boundary. 属性会忽略和一起使用时。The property is ignored by and when used with a .

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.DependencyProperty SnapsToDevicePixelsProperty
Public Shared ReadOnly SnapsToDevicePixelsProperty As DependencyProperty

span.span: Identifies the dependency property.
